国区没有服务器，也没有拔线惩罚，建议去亚服玩。匹配系统不行，11段能匹配到2段4人人皇车队。这游戏大家多皮一下都能上段，这版本对屠夫不友好，遇到速修车队基本没啥好办法。遇到速修人皇人皇车队，挂一个人直接守尸，一人掉段剩下3个也长不了段，对面比你生气。4周年我30小时弗雷迪已经顶配了， 屠夫想玩的爽基本所有dlc都要买，新人推荐先玩皮脸，先解锁人肉烧烤，又能刷血点又强力，皮脸操作还简单。之后进阶玩杨永信和弗雷迪，兔子护士和凛需要联系，属于上限高下限低需要练习，玩好了很厉害

Cons: Devs dont give a shit about the player base or bugs. So dont expect anything other than the most major game breaking bugs, and the fun bugs to be patched. (because why leave in something that solely gives people joy)
Pros:Challenging gameplay, tons of map, killer, and survivor variability. Ability to play with friends. Has ahigh learning curve so if that is your thing go for it, but you will likely die very quickly as survivor, and not get many kills as killer early on, best bet is to research and practice. Peak hours are also the only times you will likely find a match. Game has a good player base as far as size during specific times of day, though they can be toxic which is sad. If you want to learn how to play better, good resources are youtubers/twitch streamers, the ones that helped me most were "Not Ozdarhva", Monto, N00b3, puppers, and then those I found based on the larger ones. It really is a lovely game and if the devs fixed issues more actively and worked to add game modes the game would be even more amazing. All and all a great game 7.5/10, get on sale!
big fun if you obtain friends.

O jogo é muito bom...mas...

Contras...
>>>Comunidade tóxica demais - Meus sobrinhos jogam mais tempo que eu, jogo apenas pra curtir com eles, mas a medida que você vai subindo de ranking irá ter péssimas experiências no jogo, como a vez que joguei de assassino e todo mundo fugiu e o cara, no chat, me mandou desinstalar o jogo, dizendo que não sei jogar de killer. Sem falar que durante a partida os sobreviventes experientes quebram todo o encanto do jogo, pois de atrapalham perseguir, enganchar os feridos e no final ainda ficam te zuando. Pra mim poderiam dar ao assassino a capacidade de derrubar todos, com um golpe, os que encostam nele quando está carregando alguêm, talvez assim, possa reduzir tais atos tóxicos dentro do jogo.

>>>A jogabilidade tem suas falhas tanto para assassinos quanto para sobreviventes, com o passar do tempo você arruma um jeito de superar elas e algumas até aceita e pronto.
Como jogo mais de assassino, acho que o jogo favorece mais os sobreviventes, pois são 4 contra 1 e você precisa derrubar eles por 3 vezes e enganchar para matá-los, enquanto eles precisam apenas fazer 5 gerados e que se jogarem de t-bag fazem esses número em pouquíssimos minutos, enquanto você está perseguindo seu primeiro ou segundo sobrevivente no jogo. Já meus sobrinhos que jogam mais de sobreviventes dizem que o oposto é o que acontece, que as melhores perks e addons são dos killers. Acredito que isso acontece devido ao desbalanceamento de ranking que existem no game, onde você jogará com pessoas de ranking bem acima do seu nas partidas, apesar que o oposto também acontece, onde você joga com pessoas de níveis bem mais baixos.

>>>Sobre as DLCs acho justo, o preço é barato e sempre tem promoções, os criadores precisam se manter é o trabalho deles, mas você compra por serem killers famosos, pois os do jogo são os mais fortes e fáceis de jogar.

>>>O game é muito bom e ainda sim recomendo. O ponto mais negativo é a comunidade, principalmente os de ranking alto, ou seja, a medida que vai subindo de ranking as coisas vão piorando e não falo de ficar mais difícil, falo de toxicidade dentro e fora do jogo que te desanimam, mas basta você deixar pra lá e torcer pra pegar uma partida com jogadores bacanas que a diversão é garantida.

Actively avoids listening to the needs of the fan base, such as repetitive bugs plaguing the game over and over as they are patched and re-broken, the multiple racist outfits that multiple different characters have (Meg with cornrows? the description for it is "a gutsy, intimidating look"???), and the poorly executed representation of non-white individuals and completely nonexistent lgbtq rep despite promises otherwise, among many other things. If you're going to play this game, spend as little money as possible in it. Trust me, its not worth it. I'm not going to lie and say its not fun however; It can be very fun and can bring people together to push its boundaries and get creative with having fun in this game, but the developers who work on this game genuinely do not care and don't deserve compensation for their poor development practices and general game management.

The matchmaking has been atrocious lately.
I've been playing the game for nearly 5 years and now nearly every single round - no matter which role - is all over the place when it comes to matchmaking. It's either a complete stomp or you get destroyed. I can see why both sides usually resort to running meta perks and dont try anything new. It's sad to see that the matchmaking ruins a game I usually liked to play.
the game is fun for a bit but gets repetitive over time

I'm gonna be 100% honest here. I know this is a great game from my 3 to 4 days of playing the game. It is a lot of fun most of the time. my only gripe is that there are more than a few killer powers that i feel are way too overpowered. Not being able to hear the heartbeat when an invisible killer is coming at you for 1 example is just way too much for a new player (and most other players) to handle especially for anyone when they can just go invisible on the fly with no time restrictions or cooldowns. I find any power so far that the killer player is able to instant cast every second should be nerfed so that players can at least stand a chance against these over powered killers with abilities that players abuse too much.

My other complaint about this game is that hackers are able to just do what they want as killers without needing to equip perks or powers and just instantly find every survivor on the map without any realistic clue that they are there to begin with. When I notice hackers like that I just leave that game lobby because it takes the fun away from the point of the game.

I am going to be fair about the game though. It is very fun and having that feeling of a heart attack adrenaline rush when a killer is hunting me down trying to find me is nothing short of exhilarating! Trying to work as a team can often fall flat when it comes to a killer coming for you, and yet there are perks for survivors that are meant to build your character to distract the killer, builds to help recover yourself and injured allies or allies caught on a hook or even help get the killer to drop your ally (i think?), and builds to just work on generators to be able to flee and escape the killer and succeed. with a good team of players and builds and strategies you can absolutely toy with the killer player. At the same time with a properly built killer player, you can wreak havoc on survivor players. But again I mention that some killer powers need to be nerfed because they are way too good and easily exploited which causes the game to be less fun because said killer abilities can just be used over and over with no cooldown. (i'm not counting hackers into this explanation but it will affect the overall rating of my opinion of this game)

So with all that said and done, because I don't know yet how to give an official mixed rating. I am saying that I'm giving this game a mixed rating because of the hackers that plague this game and I guess have been during the 4 years this game has been out...and because of the overpowered instant cast killer player abilities. I do recommend that people do at least try this game out for themselves despite the hackers because in a match with no hackers involved it is just too much fun!

Jugar este juego es el equivalente a nadar en caca, disfrutable de cierta manera, no se puede llegar a tomar enserio ya que esto es una mera broma de juego muy mal llevado a cabo, no lo jueguen si quieren pasarlo bien solamente por el contenido del juego, jueguenlo sabiendo que es una montaña de heces e intenten pasarlo bien.
